main.name: Tushar Chutani
main.description: I specialize in developing interactive mordern web apps in the latest and gratest web technologies such as Node.js, React and Angular
main.bio: I am a passionate individual who is always on a look out for a new challanges and adventures. Would love to have a chat
main.contactmessage: Do you have an intersting web project in mind? Lets have a chat

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Graduated with a bachelor’s degree in Computer Science with an additional specialization in Commerce from one of the top programs in the country

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Working in satellite office of Ground Truth where I am responsible for developing high quality user facing features.
infoPoints: Working closely with UI/UX and Product team to deliver the highest quality features
Involved in product and technical analysis of different features
Containerization of projects using Docker
Maintaining UI different components in Angular and React
Involved in interviewing candidates for React and other Javascript roles
Skills used: React, Angular.js, Typescript, Javascript, ES6, Docker, Python

work.title: Lead full stack developer
work.description: Worked on an open source research project to manage daily farm activities. Involved in architecture, UI, testing and full stack development of the application.
infoPoints: Involved in technical analysis, story break down and architecture design
Developed and tested features for the application from scratch for both the front and backend of the application
Refactored the entire application for code reusability
Made use of D3 Javascript library to visualize data
Skills used: NodeJS, React, MaterialUI, Javascript, object-oriented design, PostgrSQL

work.title: Freelance full stack developer
work.description: Worked as a mobile app developer for a startup based out of Vancouver. Involved in business development, UI development and full stack development of an event sharing mobile application for both iOS and Android.
infoPoints: Involved in technical analysis, story break down, architecture and UI design
Involved in full stack development of the iOS and Android application with front end in Reactnative and backend in NodeJS and MongoDB.
Enforced best coding practices
Implemented and maintained RESTful API for the event sharing product in NodeJS.
Skills used: Reactnative, CSS, JavaScript, NodeJS, object-oriented design

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Worked as a software engineer intern at Vision Critical. Involved in analysis and implementation of features in rich .Net and HTML5 application with RESTful API.
infoPoints: Delivered high quality production code.
Involved in technical analysis, estimation and development of features.
Developed front-end utilizing JQuery, company’s internal UI library and Angular2
Implemented and maintained RESTful API for the survey product in C#.
Developed and maintained JavaScript and C# unit tests.
Skills used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AngularJS, C#, object-oriented design

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Instrumental in developing Service Suite mobile applications (for iOS and Android) using object-oriented design in many different technology stacks. Responsibilities included but were not limited to the following:
infoPoints: Delivered quality production features developed using Cordova and Sencha touch Developed and maintained test automation Appium framework for iOS app
Set up of Linux development environments and servers
Skills used: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Java, object-oriented design, Sencha touch, Appium

projects.description: Developed a cross platform (iOS and Android) clone for the popular social app Meet Up. Application is live on the App Store
projects.skills: React-native, HTML, SCSS, Javascript, Project planning, Heroku

projects.description: Developed a script that scrapped all the products from the ecommerce platform. The scrapped data was stored in a MongoDB instance. The script was written in Node.js
projects.skills: Node.js, Azure VM, Mongo DB, Mongoose

projects.description: Developed a responsive web resume in React to show case my React skills
